subject: College Athletics
Deaths (Obituaries)
Coaches and Managers
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Paterno became the face of Penn State and a symbol of integrity in collegiate athletics only to be fired during the 2011 season amid a child sexual-abuse scandal.
snippet: Paterno became the face of Penn State and a symbol of integrity in collegiate athletics only to be fired during the 2011 season amid a child sexual-abuse scandal.
